CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
OldVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
CurrentVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
OldVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
OldVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
OldVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
OldVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
OldVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
OldVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
OldVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: RSVP response in meeting invite message for shared calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Managers and delegates will be able to see the user who has responded to meeting invites in shared calendars. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: RSVP response in meeting invite message for shared calendars
OldVersion.description: Managers and delegates will be able to see the user who has responded to meeting invites in shared calendars. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Download Transcription and View RTMP-In 708 Captions for Town hall and Webinar
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows event organizers to download transcripts for their town hall or webinar instances. It also adds support for displaying RTMP-In 708 captions in transcription.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Download Transcription and View RTMP-In 708 Captions for Town hall and Webinar
OldVersion.description: This feature allows event organizers to download transcripts for their town hall or webinar instances. It also adds support for displaying RTMP-In 708 captions in transcription.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
OldVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent suggestions will appear in the Places card in calendar and the Places people tab when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to ‘Office’ when needed for in-person events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
OldVersion.description: Intelligent suggestions will appear in calendar peek cards and the Places people pages when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to "Office" when needed for in-person events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set building location in Teams
OldVersion.description: With work location in Teams now including buildings, make your presence known, coordinate with others, and take advantage of AI-assisted booking in the future. Once enabled and opted-in, your work location can auto-update to a specific building when you connect to a peripheral at a bookable desk or BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
OldVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: iPad Multi-Window Support
CurrentVersion.description: Teams now supports multiple windows on iPad. Effortlessly organize your Split View experience with two Teams windows to easily navigate across meetings, chats, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Authentication token modernization for Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone devices, non-touch phones, Teams displays and Teams Panels will use IC3 tokens instead of legacy Skype tokens for authentication. Admins can enable 'Block Legacy Authentication' to update their authentication tokens when available.

CurrentVersion.title:
Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery
View in Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The updated Gallery View in Teams Rooms on Windows arranges all participants in consistent tile sizes, prioritizes video on the meeting stage, offers additional layout options, optimizes for single and dual displays, and provides a unified meeting experience across both Teams Rooms and desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections on the SharePoint app bar
CurrentVersion.description: The Connections in the SharePoint App bar feature will provide a seamless entry point to Viva Connections from SharePoint, enhancing the synergy between the Intranet and Viva Connections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Advanced editing from camera
CurrentVersion.description: This aligns the capture experience in camera and editor by enabling a seamless switch to the Clipchamp editor to make videos more appealing and impactful using advanced edit capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Template creation in Commercial
CurrentVersion.description: Users can create their own Clipchamp templates for personal use or distribution across an organization via brand kits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.
